name: TagFileHeader

fields.developer_note: unused/leftover id data on older tags
unused/leftover string data on older tags

fields.name: crc32
fields.developer_note: leftover data on older tags (e.g. set to 0xFFFFFFFF instead of a CRC32)

fields.name: tag data offset
fields.developer_note: offset to the tag data in the file; equals the header size (64)

fields.name: internal size
fields.developer_note: equals 0 in loose tags, may be edited in-memory on official tools

developer_note: on some older tags (e.g. on some point_physics tags that come with the HEK), some of these fields are wrong and/or had a different meaning when they were last saved, but those tags are "correct enough" to load with the HEK and, once opened and saved, get auto-fixed
